title: Variables
text: Represent the number of each type of ticket using variables.The number of $$\frac{senior}{child}$$ tickets sold was 25 less than twice the number of adult tickets sold, so you can represent $$\frac{child}{senior}$$ tickets(c) as 2a-25, and you can represent adult passes simply as a.

title: Multiplication
text: Multiply the number of each ticket type(in variable form) by its respective value.

title: Conversion
text: Now, translate the expressions that were multiplied by their monetary values into a single equation. This will be $$10a+\operatorname{7.5}\left(2a-25\right)=2612.5$$.

title: Substitution
text: Plug a into the original relationship between the passes to find c.

title: Calculation
text: The answer is 112 adult passes and 199 tournament passes.
